document_data.name: Omar bin Alurah
document_data.siblings: [[Anjar bin Alurah]], [[Raman bin Alurah]], [[Hannah bint Alurah]], [[Alurah bint Alurah]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Omar bin Alurah''' was a powerful [[sha'ir]] and prince of [[Hiyal]] around [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Personality: Omar was a short near-sighted man who was obsessively jealous of his older brother [[Anjar bin Alurah]]. He enjoyed reporting Anjar's mistakes to his mother.
document_data.Activities: Though it was not common knowledge, Omar was connected with the [[Brotherhood of the True Flame]]. Both the Brotherhood and Omar desired to use the other for their personal gain then eliminate the other when the relationship had run its course.
document_data.Relationships: Omar was the second son of Sultana [[Alurah bint Asrah]]. His [[efreeti]] servant was [[Jalas]].
